title: What Should Balancer Smart Pool Parameters Be?
body:
Previously, we have discussed the use of a Balancer Smart Pool for generating liquidity for $SALTY. The reason for choosing a Balancer Smart Pool is to set up a "buy back and make" system which can achieve the economic reward of a buy-back without the concentration of voting power which results from a buy-back and burn system of value capture.

To create a Balancer Smart Pool we must, as a community, decide what the configuration and parameters of the pool must be. 

The following parameters are proposed:

Token Weighting:
70% $SALTY / 30% DAI

Swap Fee:
1.69% (high enough to incentivize LP, low enough to not deter buyers)

Can Pause Swapping: 
Yes

Can Change Weights:
Yes

Can Limit BPT Supply: 
False

Can Pause Swapping:
Yes

Can Change Tokens:
Yes

Can Restrict LPs to Whitelist:
Yes - restricted to Day 1 NFT Holders and Genesis Buyers for first 6 weeks.

Balancer Pool LP Token Name:
SALTYLP


Any input on the above can be discussed in #-governance channel on Discord.
